overview.title: Overview
overview.content:
SEO Volume Prediction Tool is a free SEO tool that analyzes keyword search volume as time-series data and predicts future trends.
Based on Google Trends and search history, it forecasts the rise and fall of demand over the coming months. This helps optimize the timing of article publishing, ad placements, and promotions. It's widely used by SEO specialists, editors, and advertising planners.

steps.title: Enter a Keyword
steps.description: Input the keyword you want to research and predict in the form.

steps.title: Click 'Analyze'
steps.description: The tool will automatically generate graphs showing past-to-present search trends and future predictions.

steps.title: Check Volume Trends and Peak Predictions
steps.description: View monthly and weekly volume changes with graphs and numbers showing when search volume is expected to increase.

items.title: Strategic Planning with Future Search Demand Predictions
items.description: SEO Volume Prediction Tool uses AI to analyze past search trends and predict future demand changes. Its greatest strength is helping you decide not just which keywords to target, but also when to implement your strategies.

items.title: Visualize Seasonal Trends and Sudden Surges
items.description: Identify peak periods for keywords with seasonal patterns like 'keywords that grow every spring' or 'terms that trend before specific events.' This enables proactive content planning ahead of demand spikes.

items.title: Intuitive Visualization with Graphs & Numbers
items.description: Search volume predictions are displayed as monthly and weekly graphs alongside numerical data. The visual design makes it easy to share within marketing teams and to use in internal reports.

items.title: No Registration Required - Free Instant Predictions
items.description: No Google account or API connections needed. It's completely free and requires just a simple click operation to predict future demand for your keywords.

questions.question: Q1. How accurate are this tool's predictions?
questions.answer: A. The AI analyzes past search data patterns and achieves strong predictive accuracy for seasonal trends and upward trajectories. However, these are not guaranteed future values.

questions.question: Q2. How far into the future can predictions go?
questions.answer: A. Depending on the keyword, the tool can predict search volume trends 1-6 months into the future.

questions.question: Q3. Can it predict for trademark keywords or niche terms?
questions.answer: A. Keywords with extremely low volume may be difficult to predict accurately, but the tool is still effective for getting a general sense of trends.

questions.question: Q4. How reliable are the search volume numbers?
questions.answer: A. They are relative values and scores based on public data like Google Trends. We recommend using them as guidelines rather than absolute values.

questions.question: Q5. Are the keywords I enter saved?
questions.answer: A. No, the keywords you enter and the prediction results are not stored on the tool at all. The design prioritizes privacy.
